Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.SITCONTB, T1.COD_PRODUTO, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO, T2.DESCRICAO_FUNCAO, T2.IND_TIPO_OPERACAO, T1.CODPSVI, T1.NUMREC FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.v0histsini T2 WHERE T1.operacao = T2.operacao AND T1.SITCONTB IN ('1','2') AND T1.codpsvi = :CODPSVI AND T1.codsvi = :CODSVI AND T1.dtmovto >= :SI9GW01.DATA-INICIAL AND T1.dtmovto <= :SI9GW01.DATA-FINAL AND T2.ind_tipo_operacao IN ('IN','DE','HO','DS','HS') AND T2.funcao_operacao IN ('IND', 'DPAG', 'HPAG', 'DSPAG', 'HSPAG') END SQL
